website_summaries.verdict: The best way to keep blemishes hidden all day, even at the gym.
pros: Full-coverage formula is waterproof and stays in place all day, even at the gym or in the pool
Concealer glides on smoothly and effectively covers blemishes and acne scars, especially when applied with a brush
A little product goes a long way
cons: You’ll have to act fast to blend it out

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer for micro-bladed eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: I have alopecia (lost all my eyebrows) and decided to get dark brown micro-bladed eyebrows - Turned into a nightmare! I now need to cover up the top half of brows which were tattooed way too high on my forehead, and draw on my former "real" eyebrows below. After trying dozens of other so-called tattoo concealer creams and pencils, I had almost given up hope of ever finding a realistic looking concealer or one that would last more than an hour. Then I found "Make Up For Ever"! It matches my skin perfectly, provides the best matte coverage, stays on well without becoming patchy and lasts a long time before becoming slightly transparent and needing to be touched up.
customer_reviews.author: Jean B.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Spent a little extra on trying this makeup out. Glad I did. Covers everything I need it to and you don't need much product to do it. Great investment, I'll definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: derricg

customer_reviews.title: I use this under my eyes and it's GREAT! I have very pale skin and it looks ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this under my eyes and it's GREAT! I have very pale skin and it looks very natural but covers the dark circles. I will continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage for undereyes!
customer_reviews.text: I think this may be a titch too light for my skin (just a TITCH) but the coverage is amazing. Does not crease.
customer_reviews.author: auds

customer_reviews.title: Best Makeup EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is more pricey then drug store makeup it is deff worth it. You won't find any better makeup to cover up acne
customer_reviews.author: erica weisrock

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the few products that I can ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few products that I can trust to wear on my oily skin. It provides a matte cover that doesn't have that "pink" color that most light colors have.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for the lady!
customer_reviews.text: She loves it, and I like it, because she likes it, so you should like it because I like it. Review done!
customer_reviews.author: CL Roone

customer_reviews.title: best concealer
customer_reviews.text: i get some monthly cystic acne and this has been my go-to concealer for years now. it's perfect, complete coverage. definitely worth the price. my daughter's using it now too. i think it's too thick for under the eyes but it's great on the rest of my face. i have oily skin and while the rest of my makeup needs touched up throughout the day, this concealer never comes off until i wash it off.
customer_reviews.author: riittle

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a tube!
customer_reviews.text: This works wonders. Bought for my daughter who currently suffers terrible cystic acne due to hormonal Polycystic complications. Every concealer out there worsens her face. Make up Forever covers her active blemishes and scarring. Covers all redness. Lasts 18 hours at the very least. The foundation is just as good. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Elizabeth Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT GOOD FOR COLORFUL TATTOOS. Even with three layers, the tattooos still show
customer_reviews.author: Alycia Reaves

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage, goes on super easy. Stays on all day, and comes off easily with soap or towelette. Doesn't cause me to breakout or anything. I love it, and will keep using it!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bought to cover a tattoo on my wrist and it's too yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie L

customer_reviews.title: The only concealer you will ever want to use
customer_reviews.text: I am a relatively fair-skinned redhead with tons of freckles. Any imperfections I have on my face generally get lost in all those freckles, but sometimes I get problem areas that can't be hidden easily. This is where Full Cover comes in and saves the day. I don't think I will ever use another brand in my life. This is amazing. It blends beautifully and it is now a permanent fixture in my makeup routine.
customer_reviews.author: Modus Operandi

product_meta.title: MAKE UP FOR EVER Full Cover Concealer Pink Porcelain 1
product_meta.description: What it is:An ultra long-lasting, matte finish, oil-free, waterproof, full coverage concealer.What it is formulated to do:Designed to cover major imperfections like scars, hyperpigmentation, major discoloration, burns, and tattoos. This light and creamy concealer contains a high concentration of pigments that stay put, making it perfect for use on the face, as well as the body. Clinical Testing/Results: Clinically tested on sensitive skin and dermatologically controlled for gentleness.Sephora is the exclusive beauty retailer for this product.
feature_bullets: Full Cover Extreme Camouflage Cream Waterproof
